snippet: With a dominating run for his fourth Sprint Cup win of the season, Jimmie Johnson became the first driver in 31 years to sweep the Nascar races at Daytona International Speedway.
abstract: Jimmie Johnson becomes first driver in 31 years to sweep Nascar races at Daytona International Speedway, accomplishing feat with dominating run for his fourth Sprint Cup win of the season; other racing news noted.
lead_paragraph: With a dominating run for his fourth Sprint Cup win of the season, Jimmie Johnson became the first driver in 31 years to sweep the Nascar races at Daytona International Speedway.

headline.main: Johnson Sweeps Nascar Races at Daytona
